abstract: A plan aims to offer Comcast subscribers a nearly limitless supply of movies and TV shows that can be viewed on demand and through the Internet.
snippet: A plan aims to offer Comcast subscribers a nearly limitless supply of movies and TV shows that can be viewed on demand and through the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Comcast, the nation’s largest cable television company, will outline an ambitious plan Tuesday to set up two new paradigms for how people will watch movies and television shows in their homes or on the road.

headline.main: Comcast Plans to Offer a Huge Menu of Films
headline.print_headline: Comcast Plans to Offer A Huge Menu of Films
